attributes.action: Keep the government's climate pledges to 2030 not 2035!
attributes.background: Sign this petition to demand the government keep the ban of petrol and diesel cars and the ban of new gas boilers to 2030 not 2035! Rishi Sunak and the government is ignoring climate change and the voices of millions of people!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Keep the promise to ban diesel and petrol cars in 2030:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644662
